title: Fringe Sample, late 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Yellow fringe with tasseled ends arranged in scallops. Corded top in yellow and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fringe Sample, late 19th century.
late 19th century. Medium: silk. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-69.
